method.name: isDamaged
method.description:
Returns 'true' if this element is damaged, 'false' otherwise.
This implementation returns 'true' if the structural state is equal to 0%. This means that this urban block is considered damaged if it is destroyed.

method.name: isReached
method.description:
Returns true if this object has a proximity of 100% and should be considered as being reached by the agent, false otherwise.
This implementation returns 'true' if at least one flow of the crowd has reached the border of the urban block.

method.name: damageIt
method.description: To damage this element. Returns 'true' upon action completion. The quatity of damage is here used as a percentage.

argument.name: quantityOfDamage
argument.description: The quantity of damage to apply onto the installation.
